function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Studies focusing on contagious diseases propagation and control","Impact":"Insufficient focus on contagious disease containment","Mitigation":"Include specific analysis of contagious disease containment in study evaluations","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, disease surveillance technology","People":"Public health officials, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential bias in study selection","Impact":"Inclusion of biased or limited studies may impact the credibility of the synthesis","Mitigation":"Establish clear selection criteria and conduct thorough assessment of study quality","Technologies":"Data mining, machine learning for study assessment","People":"Reviewers, researchers, and experts","Owner":"Research team, experts, and reviewers"},{"Description":"Risk of duplicate studies inclusion","Impact":"Inclusion of duplicate studies may bias the synthesis and lead to inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous checks for duplicate studies and establish clear exclusion criteria","Technologies":"Automated text matching, duplicate detection software","People":"Reviewers and researchers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
